text: The 2018 Biathlon Junior World Championships was held in Otepää, Estonia from 26 February to 4 March 2018. There was a total of 16 competitions: sprint, pursuit, individual and relay races for men and women. ==Schedule== All times are local (UTC+2). {| class="wikitable" |- ! Date !! Time !!
